entry.title: First post, not an April Fool's joke
entry.id: First post, not an April Fool's joke
entry.summary: It's about that time again. I'm actually creating a personal site after deleting the one I had from about 2004 through 2015. I got tired of maintaining the framework that I kept building my site in. It became more of a chore maintaining the code than adding fresh content. So here we are. New site! Who dis?
